name: Hunter Shark
description: A large, predatory fish with powerful jaws lined with razor-sharp teeth, streamlined body, and grayish coloration. It can grow 15 to 20 feet long.
memorable: Known for incredible speed and a keen sense of smell, it relentlessly pursues wounded prey and attacks with powerful bites.
goals: Hunts alone in search of food, utilizing blood frenzy to detect and attack injured creatures.
relations: Can be encountered alone or in groups around feeding areas; may hunt alongside other sharks.
strengths: High strength and speed make it an efficient predator in water.
weaknesses: Ineffective on land due to a swimming-only movement capability. Low intelligence and charisma affect its strategic abilities.
attacks: Powerful Bite attack that inflicts 11 piercing damage and allows for an additional bite if it hits its target.
most_powerful_ability: Blood Frenzy provides advantage on attacks against creatures that are not at full health.
senses: Has blindsight up to 30 feet, allowing it to detect movements in murky waters effectively.
skills: Possesses a perception skill bonus of +2 to notice changes in its aquatic environment.
additional_information: The Hunter Shark can breathe only underwater.
Utilizes its keen sense of smell to track prey.
Known for its fearsome reputation among coastal fishermen.
Thrives in both coastal and open sea environments.
Can detect blood from miles away, enhancing its hunting capability.
test_queries: large predatory fish with sharp teeth
marine creature with blood frenzy ability
shark that delivers powerful bite attacks
